name: Sport PingPong Cup
description:
Get ready for table tennis 3d with ultimate ping pong trick shots. Grab the ping pong fun with ultimate table tennis games “Sport PingPong Cup”. Swipe your finger in a direction you want the Ball to go. Timing your swipe is critical for a fast shot that is hard to return. Starting your swipe too early or late will send a slow shot to your opponent which is easy to return. So start your swipe when the ball is in a perfect position for a fast and precise shot.
Features:

- Beautiful 3D Graphics
- Stunning graphics, intuitive swipe controls,
- International Table Tennis Tournaments
- Realistic Table Tennis Physics
